author: Porimol Palma
title: Pm’s china visit: Dhaka now has to play its cards right | The Daily Star
text: PM’s China visit: Dhaka now has to play its cards right Prime Minister Sheikh Hasina's China visit has laid the foundation for a forward-looking and expansive relationship and Dhaka now needs to play its due role to make the most of it, according to international relations analysts. Following their meeting on July 10, Hasina and Chinese President Xi Jinping announced the elevation of the bilateral [relationship](https://www.thedailystar.net/news/bangladesh/diplomacy/news/hasina-xi-pledge-boost-strategic-ties-3653936) to "Comprehensive Strategic Partnership of Cooperation" (CSPC) from the "Strategic Partnership of Cooperation" established in 2016. The elevation of the bilateral relationship to CSPC means the cooperation will deepen in all the sectors possible keeping in mind Bangladesh's vision for 2041, said M Humayun Kabir, a former diplomat. Xi and Hasina agreed to "foster greater synergy between development strategies of the two countries", according to the joint statement issued on the conclusion of Hasina's three-day tour. The Asian giant has huge capabilities in funding, technology, clean energy, healthcare, infrastructure and so on, according to Kabir. "The question is if Bangladesh will be able to take advantage of the new relationship with China," he said. The two sides agreed to deepen cooperation in trade, investment and finance, and to conclude the joint feasibility study on a China-Bangladesh free trade agreement. "This will significantly boost trade between the two countries," said Kabir, also the president of Bangladesh Enterprise Institute, a non-profit, non-political research centre. China is Bangladesh's largest trading partner by a wide margin, with bilateral trade amounting to upwards of $25 billion. However, Bangladesh's exports account for less than 3 percent of the sum. "China has completed the entry procedures for Bangladesh's fresh mango exports to China, and welcomes Bangladesh to expand exports of jute, leather, aquatic products and other high-quality special products to China. The two sides agreed to further strengthen communication on the export of high-quality Bangladeshi agricultural products to China," the joint statement said. Ahead of the three-day visit, there was expectation that Beijing would provide a $5 billion loan in yuan for trade facilitation to help Bangladesh cope with the strain on currency reserves, and billions more for projects. At a press briefing after Hasina's meeting with Li Qiang on Wednesday, Foreign Minister Hasan Mahmud said China has agreed to provide 1 billion yuan (about $137 million) in assistance. However, the joint statement does not mention this assistance extended to Bangladesh. China has now become more cautious in giving out loans after it was blamed for the economic crisis in some countries such as Sri Lanka, said Kabir, who served as Bangladesh's ambassador to Nepal and the US and the high commissioner to Australia. In case of Bangladesh too, China is exercising the same caution. For instance, China has decided to form a joint technical committee for assessing the projects proposed by Bangladesh, Kabir said. "I would say that this visit is meant to build a relationship that is futuristic and expansive," he added. China committed to provide about $20 billion during Xi's visit to Dhaka in 2016 for a host of mega projects. Some of the projects are yet to be implemented. So Bangladesh did not get the full amount pledged. "So, China wants better scrutiny this time -- Beijing would like to look at the nitty-gritty of the projects this time," said Mahbub Uz Zaman, former ambassador to China. Xi spoke about building party-to-party relationship between the Communist Party of China (CPC) and the ruling Awami League in Bangladesh. He said "good governance requires good party". Asked what this means, Imtiaz Ahmed, executive director of the Centre for Alternatives, said: "This is Chinese approach of building relationship, which they do everywhere. Through this, they find it easier to implement their policies." The Awami League can learn discipline and governance of the party from the CPC, said Ahmed, also a professor of international relations at the University of Dhaka. Xi also assured Hasina of support for repatriating the more than a million Rohingya. However, analysts say how far it will work will depend on the situation in Myanmar, which is now going through a civil war. Repatriation has not been possible in the last seven years despite several efforts including under a tripartite mechanism under Chinese leadership. On this, Kabir said: "Chinese assurance is great and is required for the solution, but we will have to wait to see what happens in Myanmar, particularly in the Rakhine State in the days to come."

author: Magyar Nemzet
title: Ground News - Joshua with the brutal KO also sent messages to Ukraine and the Gypsy King on the night + video
text: Anthony Joshua defeated former UFC heavyweight champion Francis Ngannou with a brutal KO on Friday night in Riyadh. The former British world champion has been described several times, but after his convincing success, he sent a message to the Gypsy King: Joshua says that instead of Tyson Fury, he would now be awarded the World Cup belt. author: MENAFN
title: EBRD To Grant Loan To Kyrgyz Bank To Promote Green Economy | MENAFN.COM
text:
( MENAFN - Trend News Agency) BISHKEK, Kyrgyzstan, February 16. The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) has approved a senior loan of $4 million to Demir Kyrgyz International Bank (DKIB) under Kyrgyzstan's Green Economy Financing Facility (KyrSEFF III), Trend reports.
The loan, with a 4-year term including a 1-year grace period, will be used to finance projects promoting energy efficiency, renewable energy, a circular economy, and climate resilience in the country.
The funds obtained will be lent to sub-borrowers, who will have the option to withdraw funds in either Kyrgyz soms or US dollars. This transaction is expected to enhance DKIB's ability to finance energy and water efficiency projects, thereby contributing to the development of a more competitive financial sector in the country.
Sub-projects will be selected based on the technical and financial eligibility criteria outlined in the policy statement for KyrSEFF III. All proceeds will be dedicated to investments in transitioning to a green economy.
So far, the EBRD has offered DIKB a diverse array of debt products, such as loans for SMEs, energy efficiency, and mortgages, along with trade finance financing. The total funding provided has surpassed $50 million.
Meanwhile, within the framework of KyrSEFF III, EBRD plans to offer up to $50 million to qualifying participating financial institutions (PFIs) in Kyrgyzstan.
KyrSEFF III will help Kyrgyzstan shift towards a sustainable, low-carbon, and climate-resilient economy. The aim is to avoid locking the country into a path that relies heavily on carbon emissions, making it vulnerable to climate change and environmental damage.

author: LMNeuquen
title: El Frente Sindical de Neuquén presentó un amparo contra el DNU de Javier Milei
text:
El Frente Sindical , integrado por gremios estatales de Neuquén, presentó este jueves un recurso de amparo colectivo planteando la inconstitucionalidad del Decreto de Necesidad y Urgencia (DNU) número 70 del presidente Javier Milei , para que se disponga una medida cautelar con el objetivo de que se ponga en suspenso la norma hasta tanto se expida el Congreso Nacional y eventualmente la Corte Suprema de Justicia.
El planteo fue formulado en la sede de la Justicia Federal de esta capital y, según el secretario general de ATEN, Marcelo Guagliardo , quien actuó de vocero, fue “una acción más que venimos realizando; vamos a seguir trabajando con unidad para frenar este avance dictatorial de Milei ”.
amparo2.jpg Integrantes del Frente Sindical, en la sede de la Justicia Federal de Neuquén.
En esa línea, el dirigente acusó a Milei de “atribuirse la suma del poder público en una democracia republicana, representativa y federal como la que consagra nuestra Constitución Nacional”.
“Tanto el DNU como el megaproyecto ómnibus enviado al Congreso, es sustituir a la República por un sistema unipersonal de Milei con todas las facultades que son de otros poderes del Estado. Esto es grave para nuestro país y para los derechos”, añadió Guagliardo .
amparo3.jpg Sostuvo que “desde Neuquén hacemos un aporte a la lucha que se está realizando a nivel nacional, a través de las distintas centrales, para que los otros poderes del Estado, que hoy tenemos la necesidad de que actúen, lo hagan y garanticen todos los derechos que están en juego”.
Por su parte, el abogado Mariano Mansilla , ex legislador provincial por el Frente de Todos, dijo que “esto cuestiona la estructura del DNU y el procedimiento porque es una especie de reforma constitucional que se ha presentado a través de un decreto”.
“Tiene que ver con la forma porque esto deroga el sistema institucional argentino. Puede ser que esto se acumule en un solo juzgado, que puede ser el de Neuquén, el de Buenos Aires y será la Corte Suprema de Justicia, en definitiva, quien resuelva la constitucionalidad” subrayó Mansilla al hacer declaraciones en la sede de la Justicia Federal en Neuquén.

author: Billie Adams
title: Does Paul actually love Georgia?
text:
Does Paul actually love Georgia?
Paul’s love for Georgia is evident throughout the series. He truly loves her and cares for her unconditionally. He fought to be a part of her life and has been there for her and her children. Despite the challenges they face, Paul’s love for Georgia remains strong and unwavering.
Is Paul a good guy on Ginny and Georgia?
Yes, Paul is portrayed as a good guy on Ginny and Georgia. He loves Austin and Ginny like they’re his own children and cares for them unconditionally. Throughout the series, he strives to understand Georgia and her past, always wanting the best for her and her children.
Does Paul break up with Georgia?
No, Paul does not break up with Georgia. In fact, he tells her that even though he knows about her past actions, he loves her too much to walk away. He is willing to stand by her side and continue their relationship despite the challenges they may face.
Does Joe realize who Georgia is?
Yes, Joe eventually figures out that Georgia is the girl he met years ago. Before this revelation, he already had strong feelings for her. Once he realizes their connection, his feelings for Georgia become even stronger.
Does Georgia end up with Paul or Zion?
Georgia ends up marrying Paul. Despite their rocky beginning, they provide each other with a chance at a life and love they didn’t know was possible. They are committed to each other and willing to do anything to keep their relationship strong.
Does Georgia love Joe or Paul?
Georgia has unresolved feelings for both Joe and Paul. While she is married to Paul, she has feelings for Joe as well. Season 2 confirms that both Joe and Georgia have feelings for each other, adding complexity to their relationships.
Is Zion in love with Georgia?
Yes, Zion is in love with Georgia. He expresses his feelings for her and admits that he cannot come to her wedding because he still loves her. His love for Georgia continues to exist despite the circumstances.
Are Padma and Joe siblings in real life?
No, Padma and Joe are not siblings in real life. They are portrayed by actors Raymond and Rebecca Ablack, who are siblings in real life.
Will there be a season 3 of Ginny and Georgia?
Yes, Netflix has confirmed that Ginny and Georgia will return for a third season. The series has been renewed, granting fans the opportunity to enjoy more episodes of the show.
Who does Joe end up with?
Joe ends up starting a new life with his girlfriend Kate. Although he attempts to kill himself at one point, he survives and chooses to focus on his relationship with Kate.
Does Georgia ever tell Paul the truth?
Yes, Georgia eventually tells Paul the truth about her past actions. This revelation happens at the urging of her daughter Ginny, who advises Georgia to be honest with Paul and allow him to decide if he wants to continue their relationship.
Does Georgia tell Paul her real name?
No, Georgia does not reveal her real name to Paul. While she opens up about many aspects of her past, her true identity remains hidden from her new husband.
Does Paul still marry Georgia?
Yes, Paul and Georgia get married despite the challenges they face. Their wedding takes place, but their marriage is far from smooth. The events of the series create turmoil in their relationship.
Who is the most loved character in Ginny and Georgia?
Joe is one of the most loved characters in Ginny and Georgia. He is portrayed as a kind and likable person, and his interactions with other characters, especially Georgia, make him endearing to the audience.
Why do Ginny and Marcus break up?
Ginny and Marcus break up because Marcus realizes that he is not in the right place to continue the relationship. He wants to avoid causing further hurt and trauma to Ginny and recognizes that it is better for them to go their separate ways.
Who is the bad boy in Ginny and Georgia?
Marcus, portrayed by Felix Mallard, is portrayed as the bad boy character in Ginny and Georgia. He catches the attention of the audience with his edgy and rebellious nature.
Is Ginny and Georgia based on a real story?
No, Ginny and Georgia is not based on a true story. While the show draws inspiration from other mother-daughter series like Gilmore Girls, it is a fictional creation.
Will Georgia and Joe get together?
The possibility of Georgia and Joe being together exists as they both have deep feelings for each other. However, the outcome of their relationship is yet to be determined as the series continues.
Will Ginny and Marcus get back together in season 3?
No, Ginny and Marcus do not get back together in season 3. Although they end their romantic relationship, they remain friends.
Does Georgia know Joe from childhood?
Yes, Georgia and Joe have known each other since they were teenagers. They have a past connection, which is revealed in the series. Joe recognizes Georgia from their earlier encounter and remembers her.
Is Joe Indian in Ginny and Georgia?
Yes, Joe, portrayed by Raymond Ablack, is of Indian descent. He was born and raised by Indo-Guyanese parents and has an Indian background.
Why did Georgia lose custody of Ginny?
Georgia temporarily lost custody of Ginny after getting caught running an illegal poker ring in her teenage years. This led to an investigation and Georgia needing to prove herself as a fit guardian for Ginny.
Why did Georgia frame Gil?
Georgia framed Gil for embezzlement as a way to remove him from their lives. While he was already engaging in embezzlement, she used his own crimes to get him caught and out of their lives.
Does Georgia ever get Kenny’s money?
No, Georgia does not receive Kenny’s money. Kenny’s first wife freezes the money after launching an investigation into his death, preventing Georgia from accessing it.

author: Orlando González Cruz
title: Plata y boleto olímpico para pistolera Laina Pérez
text:
Foto: Roberto Morejón.
La Habana, 4 abr (JIT) La cubana Laina Pérez conquistó medalla de plata y boleto olímpico en la pistola 25 metros durante el XIV Campeonato de las Américas de Rifle y Pistola de Buenos Aires 2024, en Argentina.
Arnaldo Rodríguez, comisionado nacional de tiro deportivo, confirmó desde la sede la clasificación de la yumurina a los Juegos Olímpicos de París 2024.
Laina asistirá a la capital francesa gracias a que la titular de la prueba, la ecuatoriana Andrea Pérez, logró su cupo días antes, cuando se proclamó campeona en la pistola de aire a 10 metros en este propio escenario.
La matancera tuvo este jueves una gran competencia. Pasó a la gran final con la quinta mejor nota (577) y en la disputa por el cetro se encaró en duelo con la tiradora de Ecuador.
Laina llego delante a la séptima ronda de disparos por 20-19. Sin embargo, en las siguientes tres vueltas se vio superada por la ecuatoriana, quien se coronó con pizarra final de 30-26. El metal del bronce correspondió a la brasileña Marina Alves con 24 aciertos.
Tras el feliz resultado, Laina Pérez se convirtió en la clasificada número 30 de la delegación cubana a la cita olímpica de este verano. Además figura como la segunda en el tiro deportivo, luego de Leuris Pupo.
En París la pistolera tendrá otra oportunidad de probarse en unos juegos olímpicos, luego de su debut en la edición de Tokio 2020.

author: M.Re
title: JO 2024: les vols et agressions repartent à la hausse près des sites olympiques en Île-de-France
text:
Les données publiées ce jeudi concernent la semaine du 29 juillet au 4 août, soit une semaine entière des JO 2024. Si les vols avec ou sans violence augmentent, les outrages à agent et les destructions volontaires baissent. Les vols, avec ou sans violence, et les coups et blessures volontaires, notamment en dehors de la sphère familiale, sont repartis à la hausse autour des sites olympiques en Île-de-France la semaine dernière, selon les données publiées ce jeudi 8 août par le service de statistiques du ministère de l'Intérieur (SSMSI).
Depuis fin juillet, le SSMSI publie exceptionnellement un suivi hebdomadaire des indicateurs de crimes et délits enregistrés pendant les Jeux olympiques et paralympiques. Le service statistique fait valoir que ces données publiées "doivent être interprétées avec prudence" en raison d'une certaines volatilité
Elles concernent la période olympique Les données publiées ce jeudi concernent la semaine du 29 juillet au 4 août, soit pour la première fois une période "incluant chaque jour des épreuves olympiques", souligne l'étude. En Île-de-France, les coups et blessures volontaires augmentent de 10% par rapport à la semaine précédente, et même de 20% quand ils sont commis en dehors de la sphère familiale.
Les vols violents (+17%) et sans violence (+6%), notamment dans les transports en commun (+8%), y enregistrent également des hausses significatives, tout comme les cambriolages (+6%).
En revanche les vols liés aux véhicules (-13%) et les dégradations et destructions volontaires (-5%) poursuivent leur baisse déjà observée depuis mi-juillet.
Après deux semaines de forte hausse, les faits d'outrages et violences envers les personnes dépositaires de l'autorité publique, attribués à la forte présence des forces de l'ordre dans les rues, déclinent (-8%).
Des données à interpréter "avec prudence" Enfin, le nombre de mis en cause pour usage de stupéfiants est en hausse de 7% autour des sites olympiques en Île-de-France par rapport à la semaine dernière, tout en restant inférieur à la première semaine de juillet.
Le SSMSI souligne que le "suivi hebdomadaire ainsi que la déclinaison des statistiques de la délinquance enregistrée par zone géographique peuvent conduire à observer un faible, voire très faible, nombre de crimes et délits, ce qui peut rendre les évolutions hebdomadaires volatiles".
"De manière générale, toute évolution hebdomadaire inférieure à 10% doit être commentée avec précaution", explique-t-il. Et d'ajouter qu'il ne "diffuse pas la totalité des indicateurs" qu'il suit habituellement, dans la mesure où certains "présentent des effectifs trop faibles pour une analyse hebdomadaires pertinente (homicides, violences sexuelles, trafic de stupéfiants par exemple)".
M.Re avec AFP Top Articles
JO 2024: déception pour Bennama en argent en boxe, Team USA défiera les Bleus en finale

author: T. M. R.
title: La Guardia Civil busca más pruebas del parricidio de Echedey en Santa Lucía de Tirajana
text: Prisión para Echedey por el presunto asesinato de su padre en Santa Lucía de Tirajana El supuesto autor de la muerte de su padre con un corte en el cuello, en los calabozos de la Benemérita El caso bajo secreto de sumario Las labores de investigación de la [Guardia Civil](https://www.laprovincia.es/tags/guardia-civil/) continuaron por segundo día ayer para esclarecer el presunto asesinato de un hombre de 55 años a manos de su hijo, Echedey León, de 22 años, de una cuchillada en el cuello. Ocurrió en la jornada del miércoles, horas antes del hallazgo del cuerpo, en el centro canino Besos de Perro en el barrio de Hoya Negra del municipio de [Santa Lucía]({url_geo_14026}). El jueves se vivió en este pago una jornada atípica tras el desenlace fatal y parte del barrio, precintado por segundo día. El juez ha decretado la prisión preventiva para el joven por el presunto asesinato de su padre. El padre, de 55 años, tenía antecedentes administrativos por temas relacionados con el consumo de sustancias estupefacientes y Echedey, su hijo, también supuestamente consumidor de drogas, «era tranquilón, pero tenía brotes violentos cuando dejaba su fuerte medicación, muy a menudo», dicen allegados. Su madre Según vecinos de la zona, fueron agentes de una patrulla de la [Policía Local de Santa Lucía](/fotos/sucesos/2024/02/01/detenido-joven-santa-lucia-matar-97626016.html) los que procedieron a la detención de Echedey, que conducía un vehículo por el camino a medio asfaltar que pasa por delante del centro canino donde su padre atendía a los animales. Los agentes habían sido alertados por la madre del joven y presunto parricida al gritarle él mismo que había matado a su propio padre. «Yo lo conocía desde niño, nos criamos juntos, vecinos de siempre, ahí en [Sardina](/tags/sardina-del-sur), pero la verdad, no sé qué decirte. Ahora ya de mayores no coincidíamos. Solo en las fincas que tenemos aquí en el barrio, pero no manteníamos contacto. La gente va cambiando y perdemos la relación». Así lo relataba ayer en su furgoneta uno de los propietarios de terrenos anexos al centro canino del que se hacía cargo el fallecido. Mientras otro «conocido», esta vez lugareño de Sardina, aseveró que allí «todos conocían» al presunto parricida. Autopsia El cadáver del padre se encuentra en el Instituto de Medicina Legal y Ciencias Forenses de [Las Palmas](/tags/las-palmas) desde que fue trasladado el día del crimen, donde se le iba a practicar la autopsia que determinará la hora exacta del fallecimiento así como las causas de su muerte. Los forenses esclarecerán también si pudo haber una disputa previa entre padre e hijo, antes del desenlace final. La zona quedó acordonada también durante el día de ayer. A mediodía se personaron los agentes de la Guardia Civil para volver a desplegar a sus investigadores por todo el perímetro al igual que en interior del centro de animales Perros de Besos. Desde el cuerpo de la Benemérita solo confirmaron que los efectivos acudieron para analizar a fondo la escena del crimen y recabar los indicios y pruebas necesarios para esclarecer lo sucedido. Entre los objetos recuperados se encontró anteayer el arma blanca con la que presuntamente Echedey le quitó la vida a su padre. Fuentes oficiales del Ayuntamiento de Santa Lucía informaron ayer de que desconocían este centro canino que «debe ser de nueva creación». A priori, es competencia del [Gobierno canario](https://www.laprovincia.es/tags/gobierno-de-canarias/) otorgar las licencias de apertura y de Urbanismo municipal, las de obras.
